CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 15, 1947, pg. 2, reads: "End of Day - Some of the twenty-two students at the Bedford School shown at the end of classes. School day includes regular school lessons, arts and handcraft instruction, swimming lessons and physical therapy classes. Bureau of Recreation is in charge of swimming classes under direction of Arthur Leone. Seated at table (left to right): Betty Lou Clagget, Donald Stott, Katherine Hodil, Joe Murphy and Charles Kappes. Standing (same order): Geraldine Kreuzer, Billy Fernely, Carl Hocks, Margaret Blume and Walter Banaszik.- Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Betty Lou Clagget or Claggett, Donald Stott, Katherine Hodil, Joe Murphy, Charles Kappes, Geraldine Kreuzer, Billy Fernely, Carl Hocks, Margaret Blume, and Walter Banaszik posed in school for cerebral palsy sufferers, Bedford School building, Southside
